name: Mystical Dreams
description: Ethereal artwork with cosmic themes and dreamy aesthetics

cards.name: The Dreamer
cards.description: A luminous figure floats through starlit clouds, ready to embark on a cosmic journey. The Dreamer represents new spiritual beginnings and connection to the ethereal realm.

cards.name: The Mystic
cards.description: A figure channels cosmic energy through crystal formations, surrounded by swirling galaxies. The Mystic represents the power to manifest through spiritual connection.

cards.name: The Oracle
cards.description: A ethereal figure sits between twin moons, accessing ancient wisdom through cosmic meditation. The Oracle represents deep intuitive knowledge and psychic abilities.

cards.name: The Celestial Mother
cards.description: A radiant goddess sits in a garden of crystalline flowers under aurora-filled skies. She represents universal creativity and cosmic abundance.

cards.name: The Cosmic Ruler
cards.description: A powerful figure commands from a throne of meteors and starlight, representing cosmic order and universal law.

cards.name: The Cosmic Teacher
cards.description: A wise figure shares cosmic knowledge beneath a canopy of constellations, bridging earthly and divine wisdom.

cards.name: The Twin Souls
cards.description: Two ethereal beings unite under cosmic light, representing soul connections and divine love that transcends physical realms.

cards.name: The Star Rider
cards.description: A celestial warrior rides a chariot pulled by cosmic dragons through the starlit void, representing triumph through spiritual determination.

cards.name: The Cosmic Guardian
cards.description: A luminous being gently guides a cosmic lion of light, representing the power of love and compassion over force and fear.

cards.name: The Starseeker
cards.description: A solitary figure holds a lantern of starlight, navigating the cosmic void in search of universal truth and enlightenment.

cards.name: The Cosmic Wheel
cards.description: A great wheel of galaxies spins through space, representing the eternal cycles of the universe and cosmic fate.

cards.name: The Universal Balance
cards.description: A cosmic judge holds scales that measure souls against starlight, representing universal justice and karmic balance.

cards.name: The Suspended Soul
cards.description: A figure floats suspended in cosmic web of starlight, gaining new perspective through spiritual surrender and divine patience.

cards.name: The Cosmic Transformation
cards.description: A ethereal reaper guides souls through a portal of swirling galaxies, representing cosmic transformation and universal renewal.

cards.name: The Cosmic Alchemist
cards.description: A celestial being blends essences of starlight and moonbeams, representing cosmic balance and universal healing.

cards.name: The Cosmic Shadow
cards.description: A dark cosmic entity binds souls with chains of stardust, representing universal temptation and the need for spiritual liberation.

cards.name: The Cosmic Collapse
cards.description: A crystal tower shatters in cosmic lightning, as souls are liberated from illusion into universal truth and enlightenment.

cards.name: The Cosmic Hope
cards.description: A luminous figure pours starlight from cosmic vessels under a canopy of brilliant stars, representing universal hope and divine guidance.

cards.name: The Cosmic Illusion
cards.description: Twin moons cast ethereal light over a landscape of crystal formations, representing cosmic mystery and universal intuition.

cards.name: The Cosmic Joy
cards.description: A radiant cosmic sun illuminates a child riding a unicorn through fields of crystal flowers, representing universal joy and divine vitality.

cards.name: The Cosmic Awakening
cards.description: Cosmic beings rise from crystal graves as an angel of starlight sounds the call to universal awakening and spiritual rebirth.

cards.name: The Cosmic Unity
cards.description: A cosmic dancer spins within a mandala of galaxies, representing universal completion, cosmic achievement, and divine wholeness.
